price: 56. Y, ciertamente, mostramos al Faraón todos Nuestros milagros, mas los negó y los rechazó.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرَيۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: walaqad araynāhu āyātinā kullahā fakadhaba wa-abā
